name: Pilldude
description:
This is Pilldude. 
You play as a dude who is a pill.

This is far from a finished game. It started out as me learning about how to make terrain, so I spent a few hours making a cool looking mountain and then decided to add in a playable character to explore the world I made.

I'm not sure what kind of game i'll make this into...but I kinda wanna snowboard down the mountain, but I have no idea how to code something like that....yet
